info.title: Websocket Subscription Schemas
info.description: Schema definitions Websocket API subscriptions for Thalex exchange.

get.summary: Subscribe to ticker data for a given instrument or combination

best_bid_price.description: Price of the best (highest) bid in the orderbook, or `null` if the orderbook is empty.

best_bid_amount.description: Size of best bid, or `null` if the orderbook is empty.

best_ask_price.description: Price of best (lowest) ask in the orderbook, or `null` if the orderbook is empty.

best_ask_amount.description: Size of best ask, or `null` if the orderbook is empty.

last_price.description:
Price of last trade, or `null` if no trades have been registered yet.

Not included for combinations.

mark_timestamp.description: The unix timestamp when the price was marked.

iv.description:
Implied volatility calculated at time of marking.

Only included for options. Not included for combinations.

delta.description:
Delta calculated at time of marking.

Not included for combinations.

index.description: Index price at time of marking.

forward.description:
Forward price at time of marking.

Only included for options.

volume_24h.description:
Total volume traded over the last 24 hours.

Not included for combinations.

value_24h.description:
Total value traded over the last 24 hours.

Not included for combinations.

low_price_24h.description:
Lowest price in the last 24 hours.

Not included for combinations.

high_price_24h.description:
Highest price in the last 24 hours.

Not included for combinations.

change_24h.description:
Difference in price between the first and the last trades in the last 24 hours, `null` if there were no trades.

Not included for combinations.

collar_low.description: Current price collar low (checks new asks)

collar_high.description: Current price collar high (checks new bids)

open_interest.description:
Total number of outstanding unsettled contracts.

Not included for combinations.

funding_rate.description:
Current rate at which long position pays and short position earns, in funding interval.

Only included for perpetuals.

funding_mark.description:
Funding value of a single contract long position since last settlement.

Only included for perpetuals.

realised_funding_24h.description:
Total funding accumulated for a single contract long position over the last 24 hours.

Only included for perpetuals.

average_funding_rate_24h.description:
Average funding rate for the last 24 hours.

Only included for perpetuals.
